physical_appearance:The image shows an exposure table. It has a rectangular bottom and a semicircular shaped top. There are Chinese characters all over . There are also a number of pictures containing drawings. These drawings show scenes of places
 as well as people. There are also a number of pictures that depict the proper ways to take photographs. There are numbers all over as well.

subject_terms_2:Tables (Data) Photography
subject_terms_3:Photography
sgcool_label_text:This exposure table would have been used by a photographer in the 1950s – 60s to calculate the aperture value and shutter speed for various light or difficult conditions.

metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows an exposure table. It has a rectangular bottom and a semicircular shaped top. There are Chinese characters all over . There are also a number of pictures containing drawings. These drawings show scenes of places, as well as people. There are also a number of pictures that depict the proper ways to take photographs. There are numbers all over as well.
